description: Land Use and Land Cover map at date encoded by yyyy-mm-dd (year, month, day)
NDVI map at date encoded by yyyy-mm-dd (year, month, day)

mandatory fields: |Prec: positive real: daily precipitation in mm|

description: Land Use and Land Cover attributes
mandatory fields: |Stage: positive real: daily level stage in m|
|Temp: positive real: daily temperature in Celcius degrees|
|Stage: positive real: daily level stage in m| Qobs: positive real: daily streamflow in m3/s|

|Id: non-zero positive integer: unique identification number for LULC classes. Must match values in all LULC maps |Name: text: name of LULC class| Alias: text: alias (short unique nickname) for LULC class| Color: text: matplotlib color name or hexcode|

|Id: non-zero positive integer: Unique identification number for Soil types. Must match values in all LULC maps |Name: text: name of LULC Soil types| Alias: text: alias (short unique nickname) for Soil types| Color: text: matplotlib color name or hexcode|
